scripts.build:js: NODE_ENV=production browserify js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -g envify -g uglifyify --debug | exorcist build/bundle.js.map -b . > build/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:styles
scripts.watch:js: watchify js/index.js -o build/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -v --debug
scripts.watch:styles: touch .temp/main.css & node-sass --watch styles/main.sass .temp/main.css & postcss --watch --use autoprefixer -o build/main.css .temp/main.css
scripts.dev: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:styles & npm run serve
